game.name: 2019 Mother’s Day Puzzle
game.description:
Play this brand new puzzle challenge and get ready to celebrate Mother’s day in the optimum possible way! 2019 Mother’s Day Puzzle is a beautifully-designed free online arcade game where your job is to solve all complicated puzzles. Try to be very quick since it’s a time based game! The quicker you achieve your goal, the higher score you will hit on the screen! The successful completion of all puzzles help to keep your brain sharp! 

In this one of the best jigsaw puzzle games for kids, you will get a chance to play with 6 different images. You will have four different modes when you play with each picture. Choose from 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces! You can also spot the hints that you can see at the right-bottom of the screen. No need to bother if you can’t get the success in the first attempt since you can replay it again! Focus on your mind while completing the puzzles! 

Tap and hold the left mouse button to pick and drag any piece of the puzzle on PC. You can also tap the screen when you explore this free fun puzzle in your smartphone and tablet. Complete all the levels to be the winner of jigsaw puzzles! Play wisely to beat your previous score and prove your arcade skill to the world! We hope that you can’t get bored no matter which age group you belong to. Find out our all games and see how skill you have to deal with several complex and mind-boggling puzzles!
